entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch, the person who is being addressed by his son, is described as having bulging eyes and roaring at the dementors.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: The dementors are described as having cold, draining power and being controlled by Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the person who is trying to help the boy fight off the dementors and is addressed by Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: boy
entities.description: The boy is described as struggling against the dementors and being addressed by his father, Mr. Crouch.

relationships.description: Mr. Crouch denies being the boy's father, but the boy insists that he is his son.
Harry is addressed by Mr. Crouch and seems to be aware of their relationship, but it is not specified what kind of acquaintance they are.
Harry tries to help the boy fight off the dementors and seems to be concerned for his well-being.
